```{r}
library("AER")
data("Journals", package = "AER")
jounals<-Journals[, c("subs", "price")]
jounals$citeprice<-Journals$price/Journals$citations
lm(jounals$subs~jounals$citeprice)
lm(subs~citeprice,data=jounals)
```
